content: the pattern contains photos of work progress video tutorials and diagrams *please note that subtitles in the videos are provided in russian language only skill level easy **you will need ** about 120-150 gr of gazzal baby cotton yarn 60% cotton 40% acrylic 165 m in 50 gr crochet hook 3 5 mm or another hook size to obtain gauge tapestry needle scissors stitch markers **abbreviations pattern notes** to make the top the following crochet skills are required chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet video tutorials for increases and decreases pixel design **size** the pattern provides stitch calculation for a top to fit an adult female wearing medium size chest circumference 90-92 cm please note that there is no calculations for other sizes this is a straight crop-top the length of the top can be easily adjusted as per your preferences the top is worked using turning row starting from the side in one piece and then sewn together using a crochet hook back section is reinforced with ribbing so that the top will not overstretched when worn the straps are crocheted separately
